programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Boomerang
programme.desc: Estalla la indignación pública cuando no se procesa a un policía que disparó a un adolescente, afectando a Frank, el alcalde y la oficina de Erin. Danny busca al autor de un posterior tiroteo contra un oficial, posible caso de venganza.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El bien común
programme.desc: El mundo de Danny se sacude cuando Robert Lewis (Michael Imperioli), de la oficina del Fiscal General, obtiene nuevas pruebas en su contra en el caso de tiroteo en defensa propia del asesino en serie Thomas Wilder.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El precio de la justicia
programme.desc: Danny y Báez están decididos a conseguir justicia para una joven traumatizada que fue rehén, a pesar de su resistencia a presentar cargos.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando la ex miembro del equipo de la UAC y actual agente de la Interpol, Emily Prentiss localiza a un asesino en serie internacional, pide la ayuda de sus amigos de la UAC.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que está desfigurando víctimas a propósito. Además, Rossi tiene un encuentro incómodo con su exesposa, Hayden Montgomery, quien mantuvo a su hija, Joy, en secreto durante casi 30 años.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando los guardias de la prisión en Virginia interceptan un paquete de pruebas relacionadas con el secuestro de dos niños hace varios años, la UAC interroga a un famoso asesino serial que puede tener información sobre el paradero de los niños.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC se sorprende cuando Hotch es arrestado por un equipo SWAT y por sospecha de conspiración, mientras el equipo se apresura a demostrar su inocencia, sospechan que se avecina un complot mayor.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Verdad o consecuencias
programme.desc: Mientras comienza la búsqueda del sustituto de Ziva, Gibbs y los miembros restantes de su equipo deben volver al trabajo con el pasado todavía pesando en sus mentes.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Reunión
programme.desc: El equipo descubre que la extraña muerte de un marine y sus dos amigos puede estar relacionada con su pasado, pero es Gibbs quien acaba haciendo un viaje al pasado.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Informante
programme.desc: El equipo debe investigar de nuevo la muerte de un teniente después de que el bloguero que les acusó de encubrimiento aparezca muerto.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Policía bueno, policía malo
programme.desc: Cuando el cadáver de un marine aparece al otro lado del mundo, la investigación obliga a Ziva a desenterrar un capítulo enterrado de su vida.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El precio de la justicia
programme.desc: Danny y Báez están decididos a conseguir justicia para una joven traumatizada que fue rehén, a pesar de su resistencia a presentar cargos.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Las regals de la mafia
programme.desc: Decididos a hacer justicia por el ataque a Gormley, Danny y Frank buscan la ayuda del detective Anthony Abetemarco, quien tiene vínculos con el barrio donde ocurrió el ataque.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Buen policía, mal policía
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan el asesinato de una anciana por una bala perdida. Mientras, Frank es ridiculizado por disciplinar a un policía irrespetuoso y Erin ayuda a su detective Anthony.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Jeff Crane drives specially refrigerated medical supplies across the country. Watch as the Chrome Shop Mafia turns his old truck into a dream come true.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: The Chrome Shop Mafia learned of Mark Haven, and they now want to give this selfless hero the truck he never had.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Roger Ozbun is a hero to his family, and together they seek out the Chrome Shop Mafia for help. Don't miss it, as the Mafia turns the truck into a tribute to the American Old West

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Watch the Chrome Shop Mafia turn Mike's old Peterbilt into a tribute to his family's heritage; an American Classic throwback to the 1940s. Only the Mafia can pull it off.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Darlene Swift is a cult hero among truck drivers. Don't miss it as the Mafia turns her rundown Freightliner into a truck built for a queen.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Mike Lopardo has a passion for truck driving that he passed on to his son John. Tune in as the Mafia turns it into the street rod truck that Mike and John have always wanted.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Armando desperately wants something dependable and the Chrome Shop Mafia is set to give him a lot more than that. Watch as they gut his old truck and turn it into a low rider.

programme.title: Trick My Truck
programme.desc: Don't miss out as the boys set out to turn Dale's beater into a road hog monster. Tribal paint patterns and 3000 watts of audio power will make this truck the best ride on the road

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As 51 rookies and veterans arrive to chase their dreams, the candidates hope to prove their talent with a standout solo performance and take on the kick line in the Judges' Showcase.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Melissa Rycroft comes to the first rehearsal to see which newbies have showmanship, DCC alum Natalie Woods hosts a rookie at her home, and Kelli and Judy make the first cuts of the season.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The 47 hopefuls learn the mechanics of the kickline, a rookie's injuries put her out of commission, and choreographer Evan Miller teaches a dance routine that calls for power and precision.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With nine cuts looming before the team's first game, the hopefuls show off their freestyle dancing, get fit for their official uniforms and learn new choreography from Denise Dicharry.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Choreographer Criscilla Anderson uses her cancer battle to inspire the dancers, veteran mentors offer style tips to the rookies, and Travis Wall helps Judy and Kelli make their next cut.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The hopefuls practice the highly precise entrance routine and jump kicks for the first time, Jordann shares a vulnerable personal story, and Judy and Kelli make two more tough cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the remaining ladies try out for the media-savvy Show Group, Judy and Kelli are faced with yet another difficult decision, and some dancers rise to glory while others' hearts are broken.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Makeovers give the dancers renewed confidence, alum Yuko shares exciting personal news, veteran Lisa makes a hard decision, and Kelli questions Alora-Rose about a rumored distraction.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Week nine of training camp intensifies when Kelli and Judy confront Alora-Rose and deliberate squad dismissal decisions one week before the first game of the season.

programme.title: Un gran equipo

programme.title: Cesar Chavez

programme.title: Lars y una chica de verdad

programme.title: Anna Nicole (LAS)
programme.desc: Anna Nicole Smith pasó de ser una madre soltera a los 17 años, a convertirse en un símbolo sexual. Se casa con un billonario de 63 años, lucha por su herencia y sufre la muerte de su hijo de 39 años.

programme.title: Patricia, una pasión escondida

programme.title: Treintona, soltera y fantástica

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button

programme.title: ¿A quién ama Gilbert Grape?

programme.title: Terminator 2: juicio final

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!

programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Sabata

programme.title: Daria

programme.title: Daria

programme.title: Daria

programme.title: Con el culo al aire

programme.title: Con el culo al aire

programme.title: Enchufe.TV

programme.title: Enchufe.TV
programme.desc: Tu ansiedad tiene un origen: tus padres. Puede que te sorprenda, pero casi todos lo niños latinos desarrollamos esta condición en el mismo lugar: la fila del supermercado. Por eso hicimos este capítulo para que te desahogues riendo. Dale play al episodio.

programme.title: Enchufe.TV: Episodio 4

programme.title: Enchufe.TV

programme.desc: Emma decides she’ll do what it takes to get back on track, starting by rekindling her friendship with Manny, but when Manny wants to hit an audition to be a ‘Purple Dragon’ sports drink model, Emma finds herself quickly at odds with her best friend.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner deals with chemo, timing how long he can go between barf-buckets, while his cheerleader Jane, tries to bring the party to him.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco and Ellie’s retail therapy goes awry when Marco finds his credit card maxed out. Ellie rescues him this time, but Marco realizes a new job is the real solution—and might even give him the opportunity to meet new people.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Roofie rape victim Darcy is barreling down a self-destructive path and only a handful of people know why.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Manny and Jay’s faux-mance is working perfectly. But when Jay gets too serious, Manny reminds him it's all fake.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Manny discovers that her University demo reel is actually a sex tape that she and Jay made, her future hangs in the balance. By the time Jay catches up to her with the correct DVD, it's too late.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When cute and funny Rachel joins Peter, Danny & Derek’s MI group for their “How-To” video project, confidence is high.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia’s finally been granted a spot on Spirit Squad, and she’s ecstatic. But trying to be a normal teenager is proving a difficult balancing act.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Paige is on her A game - she's excelling at work, Andrea's given her a raise, and she’s going to use the money to redesign her bedroom.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Since Snake’s suspension from teaching, Emma’s life has been turned upside-down. He’s really in a funk, and the dark cloud over his head has fouled the air at home, where Emma finds herself caught in the no-man’s-land between her parents.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jimmy finally gets the news he’s been waiting for – he’s been accepted into NYU! But he’s got other things on his mind. He is slowly discovering that he has other options when it comes to his real dream – walking again.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s Anya’s first year running the Free The Children Freedom Fast to promote education and health in Africa. She has a lot to coordinate - which would be hard enough without meddling Holly J, who’s determined to make Anya choose between her and Sav.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia’s renewed relationship with Lucas is making her feel like she’s on top of the world. With the extra free time afforded by his help, she's taking on all the high school things her parenting has kept her from enjoying.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco’s world is rocked when Paige drops a bomb – her dad’s going to help her buy a condo. Ellie’s just learned she might be up for the editorship of the Core newspaper, so she’s distracted.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner and Jimmy have just one more exam before they’re finally done school and, with Jimmy's help, Spinner's sure he can pass and enjoy his cancer-free future.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: A pregnant basilosaurus, an 18-metre, carnivorous whale which lives in the Tethys Sea, is forced to kill the young of a smaller whale to ensure the survival of her unborn calf.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Going back 25 million years to the time of the indricothere, which was the largest mammal ever to live on dry land, being seven metres high and weighing 15 tons! The only threat to an adult would have been the hyaenadon which was the size of a rhino.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: The beginnings of mankind can be traced back 3.2 million years to Ethiopia and the advent of Australopithecus, a type of ape which, like humans, was bipedal. These early members of the human family faced many dangers, including the sabre-toothed cat.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Revealing the exotic, oversized creatures that inhabited South America one million years ago, such as the deadly smilodon, the largest of all sabre tooth cats.

programme.title: Walking with Beasts
programme.desc: Looking at the depths of the Ice Age, following a group of mammoths who have been forced to travel south with the advent of winter. On a dangerous journey across the Alps, many become trapped in bogs or fall victim to predators.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The evolution of the predators who lived 550 million years ago, and how the first amphibians migrated from sea to land.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Three hundred million years ago, the forests were ruled by insects. This was a world in which giant dragonflies battled with two-foot-wide spiders.

programme.title: Walking with Monsters: Life Before Dinosaurs
programme.desc: On the supercontinent Pangea, early therapsids, creatures more similar to mammals than reptiles, fight for survival alongside other animals. In the carboniferous swamps, insects and arthropods take over and grow into giants.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: This episode explains how the 120-million-year reign of the dinosaurs ended when mammals became the fastest and fiercest creatures on the planet.

programme.title: Science of Walking With Beasts
programme.desc: A look at the science that has proved Darwin's idea that intelligent, sophisticated humans have an ancestral connection with the ape.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David travels the world to unravel some of the wonders and puzzles of palaeontology. But how do you find the world's oldest and rarest reptile?

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: Could pterodactyls fly? And why did trilobites have such good eyes? David Attenborough investigates the secret lives of animals from the past, as told in the fossil record.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers dinosaur bones in the Sahara desert and visits the biggest, most spectacular dinosaur displays in the world.

programme.title: Lost Worlds: Vanished Lives
programme.desc: David Attenborough uncovers bizarre creatures of the earliest seas, tiny horses the size of spaniels and an animal that's half bird and half reptile - the rarest of them all.

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Bird expert Bill Oddie helps construct amazing, life-sized, bio-mechanical replicas as he presents an imaginary battle between a tyrannosaurus rex and a triceratops.

programme.title: The Truth About Killer Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Here, Bill Oddie asks whether the Velociraptor was really the monstrous predator of popular legend.

programme.title: The Mystery of the Body in the Bog
programme.desc: Veteran archaeologist Ned Kelly and a team of scientists investigate the find of a mummified body in the boglands of Cashel, Ireland.

programme.title: Monsters We Met
programme.desc: America was once home to such fierce predators as the giant short-faced bear and the saber-toothed tiger.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Tomb of the Cybermen
programme.desc: Trapped in the tombs, the Cybermen release their poisonous pets, Cybermats.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Tomb of the Cybermen
programme.desc: How will the Doctor rid Telos of Cybermen once and for all?

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death
programme.desc: The TARDIS arrives on 21st Century Earth where all long-distance journeys are made instantaneously by T-Mat. But aliens have invaded the T-Mat relay station on the Moon...

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death
programme.desc: With the commerce of the world grinding to a halt, the Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe agree to investigate and set off for the Moon in an old fashioned rocket.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death
programme.desc: On the Moon, the Doctor is captured by the Ice Warriors and learns that they intend to use T-Mat to spread a deadly fungus across the world.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death
programme.desc: As the Martian fungus begins to spread, Zoe, Jamie, and Gia Kelly attempt to strike back against Slaar and his occupying force of Ice Warriors.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death
programme.desc: An Ice Warrior invasion fleet is on its way to the Moon. Back on Earth, the Doctor devises a plan to destroy the Martian fungus.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Death
programme.desc: Returning to the Moonbase, the Doctor confronts Slaar and the remaining Ice Warriors and must find a way of deflecting the invasion fleet that is heading towards them.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The TARDIS arrives in no man’s land during World War I. Rescued from the Germans, the travellers are put on trial by the British General Smythe who is not all he seems.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: Finding evidence of alien technology in Smythe’s office, the Doctor, Jamie, and Zoe make their escape in Lady Jennifer’s ambulance, but Smythe gives orders to have them killed.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor discovers that they are on an alien planet divided into different time zones where human soldiers fight never-ending wars.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor and Zoe penetrate the Aliens' HQ from where the war games are controlled. Carstairs is reconditioned and exposes the Doctor and Zoe as German spies.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: In the American Civil War zone, Jamie and Lady Jennifer join forces with resistance fighters from various time zones and prepare to launch an attack on Central Control.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor sends Zoe to the war zones to assemble a resistance force. The Doctor remains in Central Control to steal the processing machine, but the War Chief is one step ahead.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor, Jamie, and Carstairs have escaped back to the 1917 war zone, but General Smythe is waiting for them and opens fire on them with a machine gun.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The Doctor is captured by the War Chief who belongs to the same race of people as the Doctor and offers an alliance. In the 1917 zone fighters prepare to attack Central Control.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The rebels seize control of the Aliens' HQ but the Doctor is forced to send a call for help to his own people, the Time Lords.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The War Games
programme.desc: The war games are over and the Doctor is put on trial by the Time Lords for breaking the laws of time.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space
programme.desc: The TARDIS takes the newly regenerated Doctor to Earth to begin his exile. Brigadier Lethbridge-Stewart leads a UNIT investigation into a mysterious meteorite shower.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space
programme.desc: A recovered Doctor escapes the hospital and joins UNIT in their investigation. Meanwhile, Channing directs one of his Auton servants to recover a meteorite.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space
programme.desc: Sam Seeley has found one of the meteorites but the Autons want it back and are closing in. General Scobie visits Auto Plastics, playing into the hands of Channing.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Spearhead from Space
programme.desc: The invasion begins as Auton shop dummies come to life and attack the public. The Doctor and UNIT infiltrate Auto Plastics where the Doctor faces the Nestene consciousness.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: UNIT is at a project run by Professor Stahlman who intends to penetrate Earth’s crust. But the drilling has already released something deadly from beneath the Earth’s surface.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: The green slime oozing from the drill head is transforming men into monsters. Stahlman refuses to listen to the warnings and resorts to sabotage so that his project may continue.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: Transported to a parallel world, the Doctor discovers that England is under military rule and the drilling project is at a more advanced stage.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: In the parallel world, the drilling project is about to penetrate the Earth’s crust. The Doctor, arrested as a spy, is unable to convince his captors of the danger that faces them.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Inferno
programme.desc: In the parallel world, Earth’s crust has been penetrated, releasing terrible forces from within the Earth. The Doctor must escape back to his world to prevent the same catastrophe.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Great Dane with an aggressive attitude; Cesar helps a shepherd mix recover from the issues developed while living in a hoarding situation so she can be rehomed.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar adopts four puppies and films them living with him and his pack for their first eight months to demonstrate how to raise a balanced dog.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive lab-mastiff mix; a Jack Russell mix that barks obsessively; a woman is concerned at her dog's habit of barking and growling at people.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Pekingese who refuses to eat or drink; a Chihuahua who bites people; two chow mixes who share a home but won't play nice with each other.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A woman's French bulldog exhibits people aggression that started for no apparent reason when he turned two years old.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Life coach and fitness trainer Jillian Michaels can whip contestants on the "Biggest Loser" television series into shape, but she's at a loss when it comes to her dog; escape artist dog; dog dislikes brooms and windshield wipers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two German shepherds who get along fine at home, but are at each other's throats when at daycare; a miniature schnauzer that barks when her owner's grandchildren visit.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A great Dane bites her owner; a bearded collie with dog aggression; a mouthy French mastiff.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Weimaraner is aggressive towards anyone who turns on one of the motorized bikes used to deliver the mail; an aggressive shar-pei; an Australian red cattle dog who barks incessantly.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Maltese hates being on his leash; an American Eskimo barks and circles strangers who enter the house; a Nova Scotia duck tolling retriever with a fear of pools.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a pregnant Ashlee Simpson-Wentz's English bulldog with his aggression issues before the baby arrives; a retriever with food aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive sheepdog/collie mix needs extra attention, so Cesar brings him to the Dog Psychology Center; a St. Bernard with a fear of stairs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Great Dane behaves aggressively toward strange dogs; a Lhasa apso eats everything she can get her paws on.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Chihuahua mix with aggression issues; a Pomeranian with severe separation anxiety; an Aussie/shar pei mix who runs away when his owner coughs.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The hunt for an elusive and clever criminal takes Dog through the world of a bantam fighting cock, a pregnant daughter, and a jungle safe house go together. And don't forget the mopeds as well as a group of hostile squatters on government land!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: What's a father to do? When the cops ask Dog for help tracking down a renegade teen with a history of running hard, Baby Lyssa, eight months pregnant and counting, insists on joins the hunt. Can Dog keep his daughter safe and catch his man?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: For Dog and Beth, it's not only another day in paradise, it's their anniversary. Beth is hoping for a romantic dinner with her man, but she knows only too well that for Dog work always comes first.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today Dog finds himself looking for more than one fugitive. He starts the day looking for a woman who has skipped out on her court date. But he soon learns that she has teamed up with a woman whose criminal exploits have attracted the local media.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog gave a break to a young man with a drug problem who promised to enter drug rehab. But this commitment to rehabilitation seems to have ended when he bolted from the car on the way to the drug treatment center and went on the run.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's latest fugitive doesn't think small when it comes to illegal drugs: he was carrying almost a pound of meth when he was arrested. Now he's on the run with his pregnant girlfriend on the high plains of Colorado.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back in Hawaii and tracking a dangerous fugitive through the jungles of the Big Island. Their prey is being protected by a ring of family and friends that Dog must forcefully confront to bring in his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Dog decides to spend the day caring for his newest granddaughter, Beth enlists the girls to hunt down a female fugitive. Heading into a dangerous part of town, the ladies will use their feminine wiles to track this mother gone wrong.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog doesn't have the whole team today, and he's got to catch a fugitive with a record of criminal assault. But when Dog finds the fugitive's former girlfriend, she thinks he isn't dangerous at all.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: For months, this fugitive has been stringing Leland along with a series of barely believable excuses. Out of patience, Leland calls in the Big Dog. The team whole team heads out to put pressure on the family and friends of the fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But, unfortunately, they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But, Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: National Dog Mom's Day
programme.desc: During the second Saturday in May, National Dog Mom’s Day sends out a chorus of yips, barks, and howls of praise for all the dog mommas!

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter desperately tries to deliver thirteen puppies who are drowning in their own fluid. Saving a sick school guinea pig is a big test for Julian. And on the Greens’ farm, Jean throws a surprise party for Steve’s 90th.

programme.title: The World Sheep Dog Trials
programme.desc: Man and dog versus Sheep! The ultimate epic battle….

programme.title: Animals Unleashed
programme.desc: A cucumber cat, a prancing goat, plus a cockatoo destroys some cups. And in our Top 5, a camel loses his head.

programme.title: 2018 AKC National Rally Championships
programme.desc: Part 2 of The AKC National Rally Championships 2018

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian helps a pregnant ewe with a tricky birth. Peter must remove a large tumour from a dog’s bottom. Julian investigates a mystery llama injury. A female rhea has been injured during mating season. And can Peter save a schoolgirl’s precious pony?

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Kitten jumps on big orange cat; pug attacks other dog's tail; rooster messes with dog.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: To mark International Dog Day tomorrow, a special episode celebrating the magical relationship between man and dog.

programme.title: Rescue Vet
programme.desc: Veterinary surgeons deliver emergency care to pets in distress.

programme.title: Dogs with Jobs
programme.desc: YUKON: AVALANCHE DOG (Switzerland) Yukon is an American-Canadian white shepherd who works in the Alps to rescue skiers and snowboarders caught in avalanches.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: An old friend of Peter heads down to the practice with a sheep who had one lamb last night, but is struggling to give birth to her second. Although neither vet nor farmer are feeling optimistic for the unborn lamb's chances.

programme.title: Pet Heroes
programme.desc: A poodle is the lifeline for a woman struck by a debilitating illness; a cat desperately tries to alert his owner to an oncoming diabetic emergency.

programme.title: Dog School
programme.desc: In Warrington, we meet Henry the Labrador, one of day care’s livelier dogs. The staff has to restrict his play because he is a little overweight and too much exercise is bad for his joints.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle is followed by a mysterious stranger, Clay and Ben plan to leave Denver following the inconclusive blood test to determine Clay's real father; Blake and Alexis show their love for Adam by adopting him legally.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Matthew Blaisdel threatens to kill Blake to ensure Krystle's cooperation; Alexis is saved from certain death by a mysterious and handsome stranger, unaware of their family's horrifying experiences.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Dex is rushed to the hospital while a search party scrambles to locate the missing Carringtons, who are being held captive in a bunkhouse. Fear of the deranged Matthew forces Krystle to pretend that she still has feelings for him.\

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: The incident in the bunkhouse leaves Steven emotionally scarred. The police urge him to seek psychiatric help to deal with the trauma. Jeff and Fallon's unexpected homecoming helps everyone to put the tragedy behind them.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Steven turns down Blake's request to be his campaign manager; Adam is stunned by Dana's inability to bear children; Alexis and Sean Rowan share an intimate afternoon; Blake announces his bid for governor of Colorado, as Alexis plots his downfall.

programme.title: Dynasty

programme.title: Across the Pacific with Te Radar

programme.title: The Cheetah Diaries
programme.desc: It’s an emotional day at the cubhouse, the cubs will soon be leaving to become ambassadors around the world and handler Emily is finding it hard to let go. Recently Sebastian has been behaving badly and has started biting his handlers.

programme.title: Across The World With Te Radar

programme.title: World's Wildest City: Anchorage

programme.title: Roaring With Pride

programme.desc: Both contestants are trapped in cars that are each suspended by cranes opposing each other. The female contestant will be locked to a conveyer belt that will be lowered into a shaft filled with hundreds of webs crawling with thousands of tarantulas.

programme.title: Fear Factor

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will be hanging by their ankles from a crane above the water. Couples must sit inside a barrel in a kneeling position. Contestants are driving on a swervy course while trying to run through a series of barrels and wooden structures.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be dropped into the water. Couples will be presented with a picnic baskets filled with a Fear Factor style meal. One contestant will be underneath the train at the back of a car, while her partner will be on the side of the same car.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants are harnessed and locked into a computer ratchet system. Couples will make their way through junkyard obstacles, retrieving hubcaps. The male contestants will be standing on top of a bus while their female partners are strapped under the bus.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants are strapped to a line on the deck, with their bungees attached to a helicopter. Contestants will cut their way through two separate ropes. Contestants are connected to a helicopter and must repel down.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant will fire a starter's pistol and run from an attack dog. The contestants will lie in a pit made up of faux rocks and burlap. A 6 and a half inch wide beam is suspended over 100 feet in the air.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant stands on top of a moving semi truck jump and leaps. Approximately 300,000 superworms will be placed into the case with the contestants. Each contestant will be holding a paint ball gun and harnessed to a reverse bungee line.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Each contestant will be asked to eat two boiled buffalo testicles in 4 minutes. Each contestant will be harnessed and raised by crane. Each contestant will sit in the front seat of a car as the car is lowered by crane to the same depth of water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Each contestant will be dragged behind a horse. Contestant will enter a elevator shaft and will be covered by approximately 400 rats. One at a time each contestant will sit in the front seat of a car as the car is raised by crane over 100 feet in the air.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Each contestant will climb a one hundred and ten foot tower. Each contestant will be asked to eat 6 worms in 4 minutes. Each contestant will have to find their way through an underground tunnel.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will swim under the boat collecting glow sticks along the way. Contestant will throw a dart and the score that they hit, the number of crickets the they will have to eat. Contestant will be harnessed and raised by a crane.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Each contestant will climb a 35 foot power pole, they must stand on top. Contestant will select a fortune cookie, each fortune is inscribed with a different pig part. The contestant stands on a skid at the back of a semi-truck.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will pull themselves into the belly of the helicopter. The number of pins left standing represents the number of live beetles that each contestant will have to eat. The contestant has to climb on a rope that is over a hundred feet in the air.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Without a Trace
programme.desc: After being admitted to the hospital with unexplained bleeding, 11-month-old Chad Shelton dies. Investigators and scientists frantically search for a cause when others from the same house fall ill.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1996 investigation into 48-year-old Martha Hansen's murder is helped by a legal requirement that bars have video cameras installed on the premises.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a talented television news anchor is shot to death outside her home, it appears to be a crime of passion perpetrated by an obsessed fan.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A human skeleton was discovered in the North Carolina marshlands. When investigators learned she'd been dead for 18 months, they knew it would be difficult to find out who she was, let alone who killed her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Casino security cameras tracked a young woman's movements until shortly before she disappeared. She was never seen again, but through the evidence she left behind, she was able to tell investigators what happened to her and who was responsible.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A bomb, constructed to cause as much damage as possible, kills a victim with deadly force and flame. When a painstaking search yields some tiny clues, police are able to identify the killer as surely as if he'd signed them.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2006, Darlene VanderGiesen received threatening emails and then disappeared. Tracking the source of the emails led police to the home of Daphne Wright, where they believe a murder was committed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was one of the most unusual cases in forensic history. Investigators had to find a way to solve a murder case using only a squashed tomato found at the crime scene and tiny, pinpoint reflections of light in a photograph.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Mark Fair left for work and his fiancée, Karla Brown, stayed home. Later, he found her dead. During the autopsy, bite marks on her body were re-examined and forensic odontology identified the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a passerby finds the torso of a woman in a cardboard box. A forensic entomologist analyzes nearby insect activity to determine when the victim was killed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Residents of Noel, Missouri were stunned to learn that their bank had been robbed and the bank president was missing. His body was later found floating in a lake, securely bound to a chair with duct tape.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1996, Derrick Duehren returned to find his Oregon home burned to the ground. His wife's charred remains were later found in the rubble. Investigators set out to determine if it was an unfortunate accident or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The prime suspect had a criminal record and his driver's license was found at the scene of a brutal double homicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Faced with three homicides that appear to be professional executions, investigators on both sides of the Atlantic must find a common thread between the victims.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1990, Shirley Andronowich's body was found mutilated. Eyewitnesses told police she had a fight with her husband the night before, but forensic evidence proved that he had nothing to do with her death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A highway patrolman was dispatched to what he thought would be a routine traffic accident — until he looked in the car. He had seen hundreds of accidents, but none with as much blood as this.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An aspiring model turned up dead and the prime suspect was her boyfriend. When he was eventually cleared, investigators had to dig deeper to find the perpetrator. With the help of a forensic geologist, they identified the most unlikely suspects.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman who was known to have suffered from depression apparently took her own life. But her sister told police that, a year before her death, she said if anything were to happen to her there would be a note in the china cabinet.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Authorities track a kidnapper who let his victim write a last will and informed the family of her murder. A phone number written on a previous page left a lasting impression, which helped to convict.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A teenager went missing after an evening of horseback riding. Her body was found a month later, three miles from her home. But the killer unknowingly left trace evidence behind.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The investigation into the kidnapping and rape of an 18-year-old Ohio woman is aided when the victim returns hours after the incident occurred. With her help, the police are able to track the assailant to his front door.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One warm summer afternoon, the town of Verona, Wisconsin faced its first triple homicide. To solve the case, investigators had to delve into the world of high rollers and offshore betting.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Doctors are puzzled when a two-year-old boy is rushed to the hospital with brain seizures and breathing difficulties. Finally, the boy's sister provides an important clue, raising the possibility of a rare syndrome.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.desc: Victoria, una organizadora de eventos, está ansiosa por asistir y planificar la boda de su mejor amiga en París. Sin embargo, descubre que su ex llevará una cita y decide reencontrarse con su amigo por correspondencia de la infancia.

programme.title: El día de 27 horas
programme.desc: Una empresaria se toma un descanso para lograr un equilibrio entre su vida personal y el trabajo, pero se da cuenta de que no será fácil. ¿Un retiro relajante y un nuevo romance cambiarán su vida para siempre?

programme.title: Amor a la moda
programme.desc: Después de estar tres años organizando colecciones de moda en Seattle, Lauren pierde un ascenso y decide regresar a casa. Rob, el dueño de la compañía de mudanza, intentará que ella se enamore de su actual ciudad.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Struggling to write a school essay on America's immigrant history, Chachi is inspired by Fonzie's colorful story told to the tune of an imagined melting pot melody.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Grandma Nussbaum teaches Fonzie and Chachi a lesson in growing old gracefully when they try to convince the feisty granny to move into a retirement home.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Howard's teen-aged niece, K.C., comes to stay with the Cunninghams after a scandal closes her Houston boarding school while Fonzie hopes a night at the circus will help him win little Heather's heart when nothing else seems to work.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: After tricking Fonzie into going to a single's camp to help him get over losing steady girlfriend Ashley, Potsie, Chachi and Roger get suckered into a sauna by three con-girls.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Howard decides the house needs a second bathroom. Fonzie offers a way to have it installed and save Howard money as well.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Joanie encounters trouble when she accepts a student teaching job at Patton High.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy, hired by a small TV station, has a disastrous on-camera debut until Mork leaps to a riotous rescue with his far-out Orkan presentation of the evening news.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork faces almost unbeatable competition for his job as official Earth observer from his Orkan hero, the suave and charming Xerko, who beams to Earth to challenge Mork to an outrageous contest for the right to send reports back to Ork.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork, who has never heard of Robin Williams and scoffs at the idea of resembling him, gets crushed by mobs of fans who think he is the popular comedian, then has a hilarious nose-to-nose encounter with the famous star.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork, lonely in Mindy's absence, sets the stage for amazing comical confusion when he gets the visiting Orkan Elder to clone multiple Mindys which he continues to do until he gets it right.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy is convinced that she has unleashed the swingingest single ever after she persuades Mork that it would inprove their relationship if each began dating new people and he turns into the hilarious new king of Boulder's social scene.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: When Mindy eats one of Mork's gourmet delights, she turns into a wacky Orkan herself, sending her family reunion into a rollicking tizzy and treating pompous old Uncle Dave (special guest star Jonathan Winters) to a bizarre evening he won't forget.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: The girls shop in a toy store for a friend. Laverne sees a toy robot and plays with it. The robot blows a fuse though and attacks her. Leading the girls to sue the toy company - but the girls discover the law can be as unfeeling as that robot.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Dressed as Alice in Wonderland for a local children's play, Shirley ends up going to the hospital instead to get her appendix out. Her fear causes her to run and hide, so the gang must find her before her appendix fails her for good.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Two FBI agents use the girls' apartment to stake out criminal activity across the street. When the suspect gets outside their window the girls are shocked to see Carmine with him. Has Carmine gone bad or is there another explanation?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne and Shirley get reacquainted with Ms. Babish's mentally challenged daughter, Amy, who's visiting from her special school. Lenny meets Amy and immediately comes to like her, despite people's protests about what's best for Amy.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: It's New Years Eve 1959 and 1960 is shortly due. In the final hours, Laverne's date cancels, Shirley's sick, and Lenny and Squiggy have a special plan for midnight outside the apartment building. Will Laverne leave the '50s in tears or cheers?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Shirley rescues a white horse. The owner wants to send it to the glue factory, but Shirley seeks him a happy home. She gets Edna in trouble with a health inspector for having him in the apartment. Will it be greener pastures for Buttercup?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne busts a tooth but won't see a dentist. Shirley suggests her student dentist cousin Mikey. Laverne's hates the idea. Mikey has flunked before. Shirley gets her okay but once in the chair will Laverne truly feel safe in Mikey's hands?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Traveling to another city by bus for a blind date, the girls end up being ditched by two medical students who don't find them attractive - leaving the girls stranded overnight with no way home for over 12 hours.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: The joyous visit by everyone's favorite, Grandma Cora, turns to gloom when she gets mugged in the park, but Mork turns the dastardly deed into a hilarious caper when he and Grandma join forces to even the score.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork, who doesn't understand why people gossip, reveals some hilarious inside scoops when he shows and tells all about his friends while subbing for Mindy as host of a local TV show called Rumor Has It.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: When Mindy has to work long hours on a new TV call-in show, Mork has to help with the housework. But when his comedic cleaning efforts turn the apartment into a disaster area, he calls up Mindy, on the air, for a new set of instructions.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mr. Bickley's 50th birthday celebration turns into a crazy exchange of everybody's deepest secrets, but Mindy waits until the group leaves to tell Mork somthing she's wanted to say for years.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy is the beautiful bride and Mork is the outrageously funny groom - who may not be able to fit into his tuxedo if he can't convince Orson to approve the marriage and undo his transformation of Mork into an English sheep dog.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork and unsuspecting Mindy hatch a comedy plot that's bigger than both of them when an egg emerges from Mork's navel that grows and grows until it bursts open and out pops their full-grown, middle-aged-looking son.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: His friends are baffled when Fonzie refuses to speak in his own defense after he is accused of manhandling a student and brought before the school board's disciplinary court.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: A visit from Tim's ex-girlfriend shifts his perspective on his current relationship. Amy and Cass try to save a racehorse with a serious condition.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Georgie creates a school project about Briar Ridge owner Val Stanton and becomes inspired to take a risk with Adam.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: When she returns from New York, Lou has her hands full with a new ranch hand at Heartland and a popular food truck making a dent in Maggie's business.

programme.title: Heartland

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy helps Cass wrangle a spirited horse, but there's more to the problem than they initially realize. Tim insists that everyone attend a holiday party.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: After their plans for a romantic getaway fall apart, Ty and Amy celebrate their first wedding anniversary at home, where Amy reveals some happy news.

programme.title: Heartland

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy helps a mounted archer reconnect with her horse. Meanwhile, Georgie's relationship is tested when Adam finds her spending time with another guy.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día seis
programme.desc: Los seis chefs restantes preparan sus platos originales, y los dos equipos diseñan sus menús para la cena de la noche.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Dia siete
programme.desc: Los chefs deben trabajar como equipo por primera vez. El premio de este desafío es un viaje con el chef Ramsay al Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día ocho
programme.desc: Con solo cuatro chefs restantes, la competencia se vuelve feroz. ¿Quién de ellos tiene lo que se necesita para ser el jefe de cocina del nuevo restaurante de Gordon Ramsay?

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día nueve
programme.desc: Los concursantes prueban el plato estrella del chef Ramsay y se les dan veinte minutos para reproducirlo. Las tensiones aumentan entre los chefs en medio de acusaciones de trampa.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día diez - Parte 1
programme.desc: Luego de una visita sorpresa de familiares, los concursantes restantes deberán diseñar sus propios restaurantes y jerarquías para el servicio final.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día diez - Parte 2
programme.desc: Desde el menú hasta la decoración, los dos finalistas deben demostrar su talento al chef Ramsay, ya que cada uno está a cargo de sus propios restaurantes.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El tiránico Chef Gordon Ramsay regresa por tercer verano para enseñar y torturar a posibles Chefs. El ganador recibirá un trabajo de Chef en el resort Green Valley Ranch de Nevada.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos equipos se enfrentan en un desafío de preparación de alimentos que recompensa a los ganadores por la oportunidad de pasar tiempo con el Chef Ramsay fuera de la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay ordena a los concursantes restantes que preparen el desayuno para los miembros del servicio visitantes. El equipo ganador tendrá tiempo libre y los perdedores tendrán el rol de patrullar la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el cuarto día, los Chefs restantes compiten en una prueba de degustación con los ojos vendados. Los perdedores deben aceptar un castigo difícil mientras los ganadores cenan con el Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Para avanzar en este desafío, los siete Chefs restantes deben comprar y preparar la comida para la recepción de una boda.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Melissa se une a los hombres en una competencia para ver qué equipo puede preparar los mejores platos de langosta. Pero hay un problema: los equipos deben matar primero a sus crustáceos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los seis concursantes restantes deben preparar aperitivos y platos principales con las sobras, por lo que ambos equipos deben crear sus propios menús de cena.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay consolida a los cinco concursantes restantes en un equipo, pero primero deben competir entre sí para impresionar a 100 estudiantes de secundaria.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Greco is a man revered as a savior for defeating evildoers one after another. Everyone Greco targets die within 24 hours, killing and being killed by their own comrades. When provoked by Greco, Lupin and the gang head to Greco's church.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A mysterious portrait of Lupin appears at a major fashion show in Milan. When it's determined that the portraits have been painted by Leonardo Da Vinci, Lupin realizes something and rushes to the church where "The Last Supper" is displayed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While shopping with his family, Nyx is shot by someone and loses consciousness. He wakes up bound, and before he is Percival, his boss from his days as MI6.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the car that the famous singer Nora Anita loved and drove for nearly half a century. Zenigata and the police are after him, but they won't make a move for fear of damaging the priceless car. Where is Lupin headed in the treasured car?!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: While in Italy, Lupin gets a call from someone claiming to have kidnapped Fujiko. The kidnapper blackmails Lupin into stealing a marionette once owned by Gennai Hiraga and now being kept in a mansion in Tokyo.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Declarations of theft show up throughout the city, and they all bear the message "Tonight I'm going to get you, Lupin III," with a lipstick mark underneath. The one who's been distributing the notes is Rebecca.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Da Vinci announces that he is going to unveil his latest work in San Marino. Its title is "World Harmony." After the announcement, for some reason, people all around the Italian Peninsula fall unconscious... and Lupin and the gang are no exception.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca's personality is under Da Vinci's control. In an effort to save her, Lupin delves into her mind, where he struggles with all kinds of traps set by Da Vinci. He manages to find Rebecca's memories, but Da Vinci has overwritten all her memories.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin meets Rebecca to sign divorce papers, before they could finish they are attacked by zombies.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Rebecca remembers the first time she meets Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #13: Alcatraz Connection
programme.desc: Master thief Lupin III, gunslinger Jigen and swordmaster Goemon are back for a new caper, this time aboard the casino-ship Machine Gun Kelly. Between the mafia, interpol, and a secret organization based under Alcatraz!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #14 Episode 0: The First Contact
programme.desc: The stickup that started it all! Lupin and Fujiko are both after an ancient artifact Jigen is supposed to protect, while Goemon happens to be searching for his clan's lost treasure nearby. Of course, Inspector Zenigata isn't far behind.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #15: Operation: Return the Treasure
programme.desc: Lupin sets his sights on the legendary Trick Diamond, stolen by his late rival Mark Williams. Instead of finding the diamond, Fujiko relays Mark's dying challenge: return all the other treasures he stole to reveal the location of the gem.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #16: Swallowtail Tatoo
programme.desc: A mysterious criminal captures Lupin and Fujiko with a very specific order: in order to save Fujiko's life, Lupin must infiltrate a high-security museum and steal the Bull's Eye jewel. One little problem: the jewel is cursed to kill anyone who steals it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's new target is the digital currency gained from the transactions made on this site. Lupin sneaks into a massive high-security server facility, known as the "twin towers". Lupin greets the guard to the key, a young girl and skilled hacker "Ami".

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Roadkill

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: Sam Strube helps finish the 1931 Model A F-Rod and takes it to the track.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: The guys attempt to check off the final five states Freiburger needs to hit all 50 by taking their junkyard T-37 across New England; the T-37 hits the road, and the road hits back before the guys leave their mark in New York City.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Soledad está decidida a entregarse a Hugo en una segunda oportunidad y cree que está con él en la cabaña. Arturo espera los resultados de la trampa que tiene planeada para el juez.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Alcides y Daniel no se dan por vencidos, ambos se disculpan con Soledad, pero Alcides gana ventaja sobre Daniel cuando envía a Hércules a una gestión que complica la situación para Von Shirak.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Hugo descubre el plan para quitar a Daniel del camino, pero cree que Arturo también está implicado. Soledad le confía el cuidado de la niña a Eloísa, sin saber el peligro que eso significa.

programme.title: La traición
programme.desc: Daniel le cuenta a Soledad los adelantos en sus investigaciones para curar a Aurora de la catalepsia, pero se asombran cuando llega una visita inesperada. Hugo encara a su hermano.

programme.title: La patrona

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Fester is so smitten upon receipt of a photo of his love, a bearded carnival lady, that he borrows stamp money to mail her a proposal. Morticia dons a beard and poses as the mother to convince Fester that he will have to work to support a wife.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Because she thinks Fester (Jackie Coogan) and Grandmama (Blossom Rock) are spoiling the children, Morticia (Carolyn Jones) hires a governess. Insulted, Fester paints a white line down the center of the Addams house, dividing it in half.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez see Fester conferring with TV muscleman Jack LaGrann (Jack LaLanne), and think that Fester is planning a television career. However, Uncle Fester confides to Lurch that he has to go on a secret diet and exercise.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez find Grandfather Pegleg's treasure map and summon Captain Grimby. They hope to charter his boat for the treasure hunt. But after meeting the Captain, Morticia is careful to keep the nature of the mission secret.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia Frump is madly in love with Horatio Bartholomew, the man who has everything, except the truth about her relatives. Morticia, not convinced by Bartholomew, persuades playboy Cousin Itt to stir the embers of his past romance with Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley shocks his parents when he gives up his new atomic reactor as kid stuff and announces that he wants to find his own job. His first try is as a medical assistant to Dr. Bird. He turns up, scalpel in hand, ready to help during an operation.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandma Frump (guest star Margaret Hamilton), comes to the mistaken conclusion that her daughter, Morticia (Carolyn Jones), and Gomez (John Astin) plan to pack her off to an old folks home. Actually, they plan to send her to a beauty farm.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia, in order to be part of the National Beautification Program, decides to become a home decorator and offers her services to the neighbors. Next door neighbor, and insurance agent, Joe Digby hires Morticia in hopes of selling them insurance.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Ophelia taunts Uncle Fester into announcing that he is going to join the Peace Corps. Fester feels he's a cinch to be accepted because Gomez plans to pull strings in Washington on his behalf. The entire family agrees to help him study for the exam.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Allyn Joslyn guest-stars as Sam Hilliard, a former truant officer who now heads a private school where Wednesday and Pugsley are enrolled. When Hilliard breaks under the strain of dealing with the Addams children, Gomez buys the school.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dr. Marvin P. Gunderson is summoned to examine Kitty Kat, the ailing lion pet of the Addams Family. Morticia decides that it is the doctor who needs help. To build his confidence, human members of the family pretend to be ill so he can effect cures.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch suffers from unrequited love over Tiny Trivia (guest star Diane Jergens), Morticia's visiting school chum who only has eyes for show business. The entire family decides to try to turn their stolid butler into a new personality.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.desc: Come along with Jack and the gang to Tasmania where they're checking out some of the most unique animals on the planet at Trowunna Wildlife Park.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Animal Engineers
programme.desc: Today’s featured creatures are some of nature’s greatest engineers and architects. Constructing fortresses from leaves, designing homes with an eye for color, and building cozy bedrooms like you’ve never seen.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack is counting down six stupendous sights- from the treetops of Panama to the mountain tops of Patagonia, the sky above Kenya, to the ocean floor and much more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Predator Alert
programme.desc: Aggressive carnivores sometimes seem like the bad guys of the animal kingdom, but top predators play an essential role: keeping nature in balance. Today, Jungle Jack is counting down nature’s supreme hunters, like lions, crocs, leopards and hyenas!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack brings us bouncing baby animals from around the world. Some are cute, some are cuddly, and some bring us hope for the next generation of wildlife.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Wild Hair
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for six warm and fuzzy tales about animals sporting funky fur! Musk ox, giraffe, tapir, bison, cheetah and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he joins some very fortunate creatures on their journeys back to the wild, like Koalas, Big Horn Sheep, Alligators, Grizzly Bears, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack explores tributaries off the Panama Canal in search of wildlife like Capuchin Monkeys, Geoffroy's Tamarins, Spectacled Caimans, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Ebb and Flow
programme.desc: Being an animal is thirsty work! Learn how water impacts the lives of elephants, hippos, caiman, giraffes and more! Six stories about the water supply in diverse ecosystems around the planet.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Jack of All Trades
programme.desc: Caring for animals can be a big job! Join Jack for some on-the-job-training as he explores six incredible, dangerous and dirty animal jobs, like wrangling crocodiles, caring for elephants, herding cattle and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he counts down some of the mightiest mouths in the animal kingdom, including Great White Sharks, Hyenas, Lions, Hippos, Nile Crocodiles, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Jack's Scariest Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for a heart-pounding adventure with lions, crocs, king cobras, sea snakes, bats and Tasmanian devils!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Creatures of the Night
programme.desc: Prepare for a fright as Wild Countdown is venturing into the night! Stealthy hunters equipped with night vision, giants so powerful they could crush you with a single step, plus bats, rats and deadly vipers!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along for a biting and stinging countdown filled with some of the world’s most venomous creatures. Komodo Dragons, Diamondback Rattlesnakes, Jellyfish, Scorpions, and Stingrays!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he witnesses a special delivery first-hand and meets some other precious animal babies, like camels, manatees, rhino and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack is headed to Alberta, Canada for a day at the Discovery Wildlife Park. He and Sue meet a couple who have dedicated their lives to helping some of Canada's wildlife survive against the odds, like orphaned porcupines, beavers, and bears.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is back at the barnyard with six of his favorite farm animal friends, like pot-bellied pigs, horses, cows, and even camels!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: It's all Relative
programme.desc: Prepare to be shocked and amazed, because today Jack is exploring the family trees of six wild animals! Believe it or not rlephants are related to manatees, the same is true for rhinos and tapirs, giraffe and okapi and more surprising animal relatives.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Get a glimpse of Jack in his own backyard on this trip to Bigfork, Montana. And, Jack and Sue visit Triple D Game Ranch to get an up-close look at bears, wolves, and even an elusive cougar.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Living Fossils
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he meets some of the most ancient species living on Earth. Red pandas, hoatzins, koalas, crocodiles and pelicans!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: In the wild, animals use their noses to find food, water and even mates! Today, Jungle Jack counts down the animal kingdom’s superior sniffers - from grizzly bears and sharks, to dogs and rhinos – find out which notable nose is the most powerful!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and his daughter Kathaleen travel to a remote island in the Canadian Province of British Columbia to catch sight of the rare “Spirit Bear,” an all-white Black Bear. Kathaleen also takes a behind the scenes tour of a floating lodge.

programme.title: Save With Jamie
programme.desc: Jamie makes a piri piri pork belly with crispy crackling to show how a thrifty cut of meat and some clever cooking can deliver a real family feast at a fraction of the cost of pork chops, fillet or loin.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie cooks up a big, bold sausage casserole, packed full of flavor -it's a new family favorite in the Oliver house, then he shows us the most beautifully brilliant way to dress an aubergine salad, served with the quickest homemade flat breads.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie gives traditional roast chicken a French twist; shows new ways to use up stale bread; and cooks up his take on a creamy prawn linguine for his friend and mentor Gennaro Contaldo.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie reinvents a roast chicken by combining it with the flavors of a Margherita pizza-basil, tomato and mozzarella -to create a glorious new family favorite, then whips up his Prawn toast toasties, the perfect snack for sharing.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie rustles up his restaurant-quality avocado hollandaise and then he gets his son Buddy involved in cooking a different pizza for all the family to enjoy.

programme.title: Jamie's Fish Suppers
programme.desc: Chef Jamie Oliver presents recipes to inspire fish lovers to try different types of seafood.

programme.desc: Jamie learns from the people of the Aeolian Islands about cooking stuffed squid and creates a lunch for one of the island archipelago's largest families.

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Chef/restaurateur Jamie Oliver and his friend/mentor Gennaro Contaldo go to the heart of Italian cuisine as they embark on an Italian cooking adventure.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie shows how to make a vegetarian chilli and pasta with three easy sauces, homemade tagliatelle, a cheat's carbonara, and a simple tomato sauce.

programme.title: Jamie: Keep Cooking and Carry On
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver makes a risotto, a seven-veggie sauce, and an egg-free chocolate cake, proving that it is not difficult to create great dishes from the simplest ingredients.

programme.title: Jamie's 15 Minute Meals
